author: andreas
content: I tried different angles, tried a square, but this one was what came out best. All other variants had problems with serious distractions on both sides. And besides: a big cloud bank was floating, with its edge just where the sun was. There was considerable pressure, because I had no idea how long that light reflex would be visible. This is in the entrance to the cemetery. Add some people passing through and you get it ðŸ™‚
